data.actual_result: The outside edge has a slight outline matching the colour of the status
data.expected_result: Outside edge has no other outline (as it is on desktop)
data.short_description: User status in user profile has outline around the gray outline
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the user profile of a user that is in any status except offline/Invisible - Observe the outside edge of the gray outline around the status
